org.jetel.exception

Interface IParserExceptionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractParserExceptionHandler, LenientParserExceptionHandler, StrictParserExceptionHandler

    public interface IParserExceptionHandler
    Interface for common handling of BadDataFormatException in parsers.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • handleException

      • populateHandler

        void populateHandler(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                   DataRecord record,
                   int recordNumber,
                   int fieldNumber,
                   java.lang.String offendingValue,
                   BadDataFormatException exception)
        Sets all internal fields of handler.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - description of catched exception
        record - data record, where exception was appeared
        recordNumber - number of data record
        fieldNumber - number of field
        offendingValue - non-parsable string
        exception - handled BadDataFormatException
